item.description: Come on out to Sakura Tokyo for a fabulous evening with fantastic music and join us for Japanese dinner first! These guys really rock and if you already know of this group, you know exactly the turnout of those that come to see them! You won't want to miss this event! There is NO Cover Charge for this entertainment. Reservations for dinner is at 8 pm and the band starts playing around 9:30 pm. Please state in your rsvp if you will be joining us for dinner so I can make the reservations, thanks!
item.name: DR. ROBERT -absolutely the greatest band!
